name: autohide the menu & sidebar [Detroit News]
description: Hides The Detroit News's header, footer, and sidebar. (But not permanently - hover at the edges of the screen to restore them.) For old/archived articles. For new articles, there is this: style 67653.
additional_info:
The thin vertical bars at the left edge of the screen are the collapsed header, sidebar, and footer. Mouse over them to restore the element.

This style only applies to old/archived articles, which still use the old layout. The site now uses the Gannett (USA Today) layout. For new articles, you want this: style 67653.
